long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add buttons to CSrankings.org to allow the user to view the data in terms of people, rather than universities.

Currently, CSrankings.org only allows ranking of universities in computer science. However, it is quite useful to see a ranking of the people, rather than universities.

This extension adds three buttons to the top of CSrankings.org to see the ranking of people, rather than universities.

"All Authors (adj)" ranks people based on the adjusted publication counts, "All Authors (raw)" ranks people based on the raw publication counts, and "Reset" undoes all the changes and puts the page back to ranking universities.
